did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, financial papers, reports, and related materials dealing with activities in the Arizona Cattle Growers' Association, the Arizona Livestock Sanitary Board, various farm credit associations, the livestock interests of the Hearst Enterprises, and the California Cattlemen's Association. Included is political material concerning Osborn's 1940 campaign, and McKinney's own campaign in 1942.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Daniel C. McKinney papers (AZ 014). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Cattle rancher; President, Arizona Cattle Growers' Association, 1932, Member, Arizona Livestock Sanitary Board, 1931-1932, worked with various credit banks and the Hearst Corporation analyzing livestock and ranching operations. Managed primary campaign for Sidney P. Osborn, Democratic nominee for Governor of Arizona, 1940. McKinney was a 1942 candidate for the Democratic nomination for Governor of Arizona.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into three series:

list.item: Series I: Business and Association Correspondence, 1929-1939

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, financial papers, reports, and related materials dealing with activities in the Arizona Cattle Growers' Association, the Arizona Livestock Sanitary Board, various farm credit associations, the livestock interests of the Hearst Enterprises, and the California Cattlemen's Association. Included is political material concerning Osborn's 1940 campaign, and McKinney's own campaign in 1942.

item.corpname: Hearst Sunical Land and Packing Corporation

did.unittitle: Series I: Business and Association Correspondence, 1929-1939
Various credit organizations, personal business, etc. 1931-1939
Babicora Development Co., Mexico--miscellaneous financial papers, map, etc. 1935-1938
Hearst Sunical Land and Packing Corporation, miscellaneous financial papers. 1935-1938
"Osborn for Governor," political campaign (includes correspondence, clippings, speeches). 1940-1941
"McKinney for Governor," political campaign (includes correspondence, clippings, speeches, campaign literature). 1942
